name: Trafalgar Law
text: On Play: Reveal a "Supernovas" type character card from your hand and add it to the top of your life face down. Then, if your leader has the "Supernovas" type, give up to 1 rested DON!! to your leader.

effect.text: Reveal a "Supernovas" type character card from your hand and add it to the top of your life face down. Then, if your leader has the "Supernovas" type, give up to 1 rested DON!! to your leader.
